changes: Unified Mute: Muting the player now also silences all ambient sounds.
Visual Tweaks: Increased opacity of menus (Ambient, Stations, Themes) for better readability when overlapping.
Mobile Optimization: Station Selector is now fixed at the bottom center to prevent overlapping.
Tablet Layout: Control Panel now uses vertical stack layout on tablet (md) screens for better touch usability.
Clock Positioning: Adjusted Digital Clock dynamic positioning to adapt to vertical/horizontal Control Panel.
Mobile Experience: Automatically hide complex widgets (Notes, Tasks) on small screens for cleaner UI.
Draggable Widgets: Widget Panel is now a floating, persistent window that can be dragged anywhere.
Immersive Integration: Widgets now respect Zen Mode and auto-hide with the interface.
Assets Overhaul: New calm, abstract Favicon and atmospheric Open Graph image.
Visual Refinements: Standardized headers, repositioned clock, and enhanced transparency.
SEO: Added comprehensive Open Graph meta tags.
Theme Palette: Added 10+ themes including Classic, Retro, Cyber, and Daisy.
Multi-page Notes: Notes widget now supports 3 independent pages.
Widget Panel: Standardized height and improved layout stability.
New Genre: Added 'House' category.
UI Refinements: Improved control panel positioning and menu spacing.
Unified Menu System: Consolidated Stations, Ambient, and Widgets into a central bottom dock.
Visual Polish: Added cinematic vignette overlay and authentic dark glassmorphism.
Layout: Centered Control Panel and Menus for a balanced, symmetrical design.
Info: Added Station Category display to the Now Playing section.
Added Productivity Widgets: Pomodoro Timer, Todo List, and Notes.
Implemented Ambient Mixer with Rain, Fire, Birds, and Thunder sounds.
Added Immersive Mode (Zen Mode) to hide UI elements.
Initial Release: Lofi Station Radio.
Core Player: Robust YouTube playback with autoplay handling.
Station Selector: Categorized lofi channels.
